title: Embroidery Sample
description: background is off-white fabric; applied 3-3/8\" black border, tapered at upper edge; applied 3/8\" rayon machine embroidered black tape; cross stitch running pattern of geometric embroidery enclosed by diamonds and pyramids in multicolors
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
